alert.note: Alert for Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 3:47PM EDT until August 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Manatee River Near Myakka Head at SR 64 affecting Manatee County. Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall associated with Hurricane Idalia is causing some local rivers to rise into Flood Stage over the next couple of days. For the Manatee...including Myakka Head at SR 64, Rye Bridge...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Manatee River near Myakka Head at SR 64. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Private road and bridge 1 mile downstream flood. Agricultural, rural Kibler area begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 06/27/1996. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Manatee River Myakka Head at SR 11.0 7.0 Wed 3 pm 10.9 9.7 8.1 6.7 6.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1115 AM EDT.
